name: Drum-machine
info: A Web Audio API drum-machine in vanilla JS
description: A Web Audio API drum-machine in vanilla JS

name: Time tracking dashboard
description: Singleton approach, responsive one-page app. To increase performance it loads JSON-data once, then renders user-data from memory. Taking that one step further, i used createElement() & createDocumentFragment() to make it both XSS-safe and faster (than innerHTML).

name: Blackjack JS
description: I made this while on winter-holidays from the Kodehode Fullstack-Developer course. It follows SOLID principles, which makes it easily extendible and portable (to other languages).

name: Pure-CSS table-tennis
info: Table tennis animation using only CSS
description: Wrote this for the css-animation assignment at Kodehode. I leveraged box-shadows within animation-keyframes to give the illusion of 3d-movement.
